description: Enterprise techniques used by Matroyshka, ATT&CK software S0167 v1.0
name: Matroyshka (S0167)

techniques.comment: Matroyshka is capable of providing Meterpreter shell access.
Matroyshka is capable of stealing Outlook passwords.
Matroyshka obfuscates API function names using a substitute cipher combined with Base64 encoding.
Matroyshka uses reflective DLL injection to inject the malicious library and execute the RAT.
Matroyshka can establish persistence by adding Registry Run keys.
Matroyshka uses rundll32.exe in a Registry Run key value for execution as part of its persistence mechanism.
Matroyshka can establish persistence by adding a Scheduled Task named "Microsoft Boost Kernel Optimization".
Matroyshka is capable of performing screen captures.
